Comment: Just above what you quoted on page 12 (page 14 according to the e reader).  "The Budget funds the 988 Suicide Prevention and Crisis Lifeline at 2024 Enacted levels. The Budget maintains the $10 million for specialized services for Spanish speakers seeking access to 988 services through texts or chats and eliminates the 2024 Congressionally-directed set-aside within the 988 for Specialized Services for LGBTQ+ Youth. By April 15, please provide a proposed allocation of 988 funding."  Eliminating the 2024 set aside for LBGTQ+ youth is cutting the budget.  The proposed 2026 budget is $519.618.
